occ-capacity-request
********************


Description
===========

A single request of some quantity of a specific server type, in a
specific location and expected delivery date. The maximum amount
possible to request is the smallest number between the number of
servers available for purchase and the number of servers allowed by
the constraints (For example, power, network, physical space, and so
on).


Available Commands
==================

* create

* delete

* get

* patch

* patch-internal

* update

* update-internal
